statements: SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT evaluation_id, evaluation_date FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS max_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations;
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_evaluations FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS evaluations_count FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT evaluator_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY evaluator_id;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE feedback LIKE '%improvement%';
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating IN (4, 5);
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations;
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102);
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS max_rating, MIN(performance_rating) AS min_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id = 123 AND performance_rating > 4
SELECT employee_id, evaluator_id, performance_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 3 AND 5
SELECT * FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT evaluator_id FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating < 3
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(evaluation_id) AS total_evaluations FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_evaluations > 5
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT employee_id, MAX(performance_rating) AS max_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT employee_id, MIN(performance_rating) AS min_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT evaluator_id, COUNT(DISTINCT employee_id) AS total_employees FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY evaluator_id HAVING total_employees > 2
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE feedback ILIKE '%improve%'
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01' AND performance_rating < 3
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating IS NULL
SELECT employee_id, SUM(performance_rating) AS total_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT evaluator_id) AS total_evaluators FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_evaluators > 1
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluator_id = 456
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT evaluator_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM remote_work_performance_evaluations GROUP BY evaluator_id HAVING AVG(performance_rating) > 3
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date, rating FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT feedback_text FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_date FROM employee_feedback;
SELECT evaluation_id, rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employee_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM performance_evaluations WHERE rating <= 2;
SELECT feedback_text FROM employee_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 100;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, rating FROM performance_evaluations ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS num_evaluations FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS num_feedback FROM employee_feedback GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT feedback_id, employee_id, feedback_date FROM employee_feedback LIMIT 10;
SELECT evaluation_id, rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluation_date FROM performance_evaluations WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS num_evaluations FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_evaluations > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations ORDER BY evaluation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE rating IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT employee_id, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(DISTINCT evaluation_date) AS num_unique_dates FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT evaluation_id, CONCAT('Eval-', evaluation_id) AS eval_name FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(rating) AS total_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_rating > 20;
SELECT employee_id, MIN(rating) AS min_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS num_evaluations FROM performance_evaluations WHERE rating < 3 GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE feedback IS NULL;
SELECT MAX(evaluation_date) AS latest_evaluation_date FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT AVG(rating) AS overall_avg_rating FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_evaluations, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_evaluations GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance;
SELECT * FROM TeamLeaders;
SELECT leader_name, team_name FROM TeamLeaders;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackHistory;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, reviewed_by FROM FeedbackHistory;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM FeedbackHistory;
SELECT leader_name, team_name FROM TeamLeaders WHERE total_members_count > 5;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score > 8.0;
SELECT feedback_id, reviewed_by FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TeamLeaders WHERE team_name LIKE 'Sales%';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformance ORDER BY performance_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT leader_name, total_members_count FROM TeamLeaders WHERE total_members_count >= 10;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE evaluation_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE employee_id IN (101, 102, 103);
SELECT * FROM TeamLeaders WHERE leader_id = 201;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM EmployeePerformance WHERE performance_score < 60;
SELECT * FROM TeamLeaders WHERE total_members_count > 10;
SELECT team_name, total_members_count FROM TeamLeaders WHERE leader_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, feedback_text FROM FeedbackHistory WHERE feedback_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance INNER JOIN FeedbackHistory ON EmployeePerformance.employee_id = FeedbackHistory.employee_id;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.evaluation_date, f.feedback_date FROM EmployeePerformance e INNER JOIN FeedbackHistory f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance LEFT JOIN FeedbackHistory ON EmployeePerformance.employee_id = FeedbackHistory.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformance RIGHT JOIN FeedbackHistory ON EmployeePerformance.employee_id = FeedbackHistory.employee_id;
SELECT e.employee_id, e.performance_score, f.feedback_text FROM EmployeePerformance e LEFT JOIN FeedbackHistory f ON e.employee_id = f.employee_id;
SELECT t.team_name, COUNT(f.feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM TeamLeaders t LEFT JOIN FeedbackHistory f ON t.leader_id = f.reviewed_by GROUP BY t.team_name;
SELECT leader_id, leader_name FROM TeamLeaders WHERE leader_id IN (SELECT reviewed_by FROM FeedbackHistory);
SELECT * FROM TeamLeaders WHERE total_members_count > (SELECT AVG(total_members_count) FROM TeamLeaders);
SELECT t.team_name, e.employee_id, f.reviewed_by FROM TeamLeaders t INNER JOIN FeedbackHistory f ON t.leader_id = f.reviewed_by LEFT JOIN EmployeePerformance e ON f.employee_id = e.employee_id;
SELECT t.team_name, e.employee_id, f.reviewed_by FROM (TeamLeaders t JOIN FeedbackHistory f ON t.leader_id = f.reviewed_by) LEFT JOIN EmployeePerformance e ON f.employee_id = e.employee_id;
SELECT leader_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_performance FROM TeamLeaders t JOIN EmployeePerformance e ON t.leader_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY leader_id;
SELECT t.team_name, MAX(e.performance_score) AS max_performance FROM TeamLeaders t JOIN EmployeePerformance e ON t.leader_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY t.team_name;
SELECT t.team_name, MIN(e.performance_score) AS min_performance FROM TeamLeaders t JOIN EmployeePerformance e ON t.leader_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY t.team_name;
SELECT t.team_name, AVG(e.performance_score) AS avg_performance FROM TeamLeaders t JOIN EmployeePerformance e ON t.leader_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY t.team_name HAVING avg_performance > 70;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceEvaluation;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM EvaluationCriteria;
SELECT * FROM DevelopmentPlan;
SELECT evaluation_id, employee_id, evaluator_id FROM PerformanceEvaluation;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employee;
SELECT criteria_id, criteria_name FROM EvaluationCriteria;
SELECT plan_id, employee_id, start_date, end_date FROM DevelopmentPlan;
SELECT evaluation_id, performance_rating FROM PerformanceEvaluation;
SELECT employee_id, department FROM Employee;
SELECT criteria_id, description FROM EvaluationCriteria;
SELECT plan_id, action_items FROM DevelopmentPlan;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM EvaluationCriteria WHERE criteria_name = 'Communication Skills';
SELECT * FROM DevelopmentPlan WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) FROM PerformanceEvaluation;
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) FROM PerformanceEvaluation;
SELECT MIN(performance_rating) FROM PerformanceEvaluation;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT PE.evaluation_id, PE.evaluation_date, EC.criteria_name FROM PerformanceEvaluation PE JOIN EvaluationCriteria EC ON PE.performance_rating = EC.criteria_id;
SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, COUNT(EP.evaluation_id) AS total_evaluations FROM Employee E LEFT JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.employee_id GROUP BY E.employee_id;
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS highest_rating FROM PerformanceEvaluation;
SELECT * FROM DevelopmentPlan WHERE employee_id = 5 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.evaluator_id, EP.performance_rating FROM Employee E INNER JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.employee_id WHERE EP.performance_rating >= 4;
SELECT EP.employee_id, EP.evaluation_date, DP.start_date, DP.end_date FROM PerformanceEvaluation EP LEFT JOIN DevelopmentPlan DP ON EP.employee_id = DP.employee_id WHERE DP.plan_id IS NULL;

SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.evaluation_date, DP.start_date, DP.end_date FROM PerformanceEvaluation EP LEFT JOIN DevelopmentPlan DP ON EP.employee_id = DP.employee_id INNER JOIN Employee E ON EP.employee_id = E.employee_id WHERE DP.plan_id IS NOT NULL;

SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.evaluation_date, DP.end_date, DP.action_items FROM PerformanceEvaluation EP JOIN DevelopmentPlan DP ON EP.employee_id = DP.employee_id JOIN Employee E ON EP.employee_id = E.employee_id WHERE DP.end_date < EP.evaluation_date;

SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.performance_rating, EC.criteria_name FROM Employee E JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.employee_id JOIN EvaluationCriteria EC ON EP.performance_rating = EC.criteria_id;
SELECT * FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE performance_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.evaluator_id, EP.performance_rating FROM Employee E JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.evaluator_id WHERE EP.performance_rating <= 2;
SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, DP.action_items FROM Employee E LEFT JOIN DevelopmentPlan DP ON E.employee_id = DP.employee_id WHERE DP.action_items LIKE '%training%';

SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.perfomance_rating, EC.criteria_name FROM Employee E JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.employee_id JOIN EvaluationCriteria EC ON EP.performance_rating = EC.criteria_id WHERE EP.evaluation_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM PerformanceEvaluation;

SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.evaluation_date, EP.performance_rating, DP.start_date, DP.end_date FROM Employee E JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.employee_id JOIN DevelopmentPlan DP ON E.employee_id = DP.employee_id;
SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, DP.start_date, DP.end_date FROM Employee E JOIN DevelopmentPlan DP ON E.employee_id = DP.employee_id WHERE DP.end_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.evaluation_date, EP.performance_rating FROM Employee E JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.employee_id WHERE EP.evaluation_date < DATE('now');
SELECT * FROM DevelopmentPlan WHERE start_date < DATE('now') ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT E.first_name, E.last_name, EP.performance_rating, EC.criteria_name FROM Employee E JOIN PerformanceEvaluation EP ON E.employee_id = EP.employee_id JOIN EvaluationCriteria EC ON EP.performance_rating = EC.criteria_id WHERE EP.evaluation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM managers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM managers WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM development_goals;
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, target_completion_date FROM development_goals WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions;
SELECT topic, session_date, duration_hours FROM training_sessions WHERE trainer = 'John Doe';
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, target_completion_date, status FROM development_goals WHERE target_completion_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date, performance_rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date LIKE '2022%';
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE email IS NULL;
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, status FROM development_goals WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT employee_id, feedback FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating < 3;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM managers WHERE department = 'Marketing';
SELECT employee_id, goal_description, target_completion_date FROM development_goals WHERE employee_id = '12345';
SELECT topic, duration_hours, trainer FROM training_sessions WHERE duration_hours > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT employee_id, evaluation_date FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT manager_id, employee_id, department FROM managers WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT manager_id, first_name, last_name FROM managers WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM development_goals WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT goal_id, goal_description, status FROM development_goals WHERE status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM training_sessions WHERE session_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT topic, duration_hours, trainer FROM training_sessions WHERE duration_hours >= 2;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations JOIN employees ON performance_evaluations.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees JOIN managers ON employees.employee_id = managers.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM development_goals JOIN employees ON development_goals.employee_id = employees.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM training_sessions JOIN employees ON training_sessions.trainer = employees.first_name;
SELECT * FROM development_goals JOIN employees ON development_goals.employee_id = employees.employee_id JOIN managers ON employees.employee_id = managers.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM performance_evaluations WHERE performance_rating > 4 AND feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM employees;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_evaluations FROM performance_evaluations;
SELECT AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM performance_evaluations WHERE evaluation_date > '2021-01-01';
